title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks extend declines after indexes snap 4-day winning streak - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks extend declines after indexes snap 4-day winning streak  Yahoo Finance
description: Stocks fell Thursday to close out a turbulent quarter in the red as investors weighed a decision by President Joe Biden to carry out the largest oil release ever from the country's strategic petroleum reserve in an effort to mitigate spiking energy prices.
